message: Sorry Manchester United, but Thomas Müller 'will never leave FC Bayern München' and is set to enter talks over a new contract.
name: ESPN FC

comments.name: Monica Wright
comments.message: Not really surprised. Disappointed, but not surprised. Müller is a Bayern man to the core.

comments.name: Ikenna Uba
comments.message: As a United fan, one of the issues I find as a fault with my team is that they chase targets that even we as fans see as unrealistic. Unless it's all paper and media speculation, how  do we go on chasing Muller and Sergio Ramos knowing how their teams rate and need them? First they will be very very expensive then secondly are United currently faring better than Bayern and Real? I even saw with annoyance the news that United felt betrayed by Ramos. They ought to chase more realistic targets like the ones they signed and that way they get to finish their business early
